name: tm06
effect: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
